features: 【Stainless Steel Material】Hair dryer wall mount is made of high quality stainless steel, high temperature resistance, rust-resistant, durable and exquisite for long time use.

【Universal Size】The inner diameter of the hair dryer wall stand is 7.5 cm, which is suitable for most styles and sizes of hair dryers, and can even be used for small irons. Don't worry about the small size that can't be used.

【Widely Application】The the wall mount hair dryer holder can be easy installed in the Bathroom toilet shower bedroom washroom balcony bathroom cabinets hair salons etc.Great thing to tidy up your hair electricals!

【Easy to install】1. Nail-free adhesive: Clean and dry the target surface, apply nail-free adhesive on the back, press firmly with both hands for two minutes, and use the auxiliary strips after 48 hours of sticking.2. Drill holes: Drill holes in the surface of wallpaper and painted walls, etc.
【Universal Size】The inner diameter of the hair dryer wall stand is 7.3 cm, which is suitable for most styles and sizes of hair dryers, and can even be used for small irons.
description: Great holder to keep hair dryer well-organized. Material: stainless steel Product weight: approx. 100 g Load capacity: up to 2 kg Size: 110*92*51 mm (L*W*H), inner diameter: 73 mm Colour: silver Please select the appropriate mounting method according to your installation location.
